oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Publication, “2nd Decade of the Playhouse,” Nashville, Tennessee, 1945
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A publication about the history of the Nashville Community Playhouse, published by the theatrical company, October 8th, 1945. The introduction is by the new Executive Director, Mr. Raymond Johnson. A brief history of the theatre movement in Nashville is presented, as well as a detailed listing of former season productions of the Nashville Community Playhouse. Includes information about the Nashville Children’s Theater, founded by the Nashville Junior League, as well as the Playhouse governance and artist membership. Forms part of the Wilhelmina Webb Collection. 1 program.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Johnson, Raymond
